attributes.action: Change E-petitions to include honours & appointments
attributes.additional_details:
The government has said that E-petitions cannot include information about honours or appointments.
This needs to be changed.
The UK population should be able to nominate a person or group for an award or honour.
The UK population should be able to require the government to honour a person or group of persons fo an honour or appointment.

rejection.details: Members of the public are able to nominate individuals for awards and honours.   Further information is available via the above web address.
